rule: If the word corresponds to a part of speech, the output must be exactly one of the tags from the specified list of part-of-speech tags, without adding any explanations or characters.
input: Every student is present today. student
complianceText:
The chatbot output consists solely of the text "NN". According to the description, the task is to return only the part of speech tag for a given word. The description provides a list of these tags, and "NN" is one of the tags listed, representing "Noun, singular or mass." Therefore, the chatbot output complies with the description as it returns only a part of speech tag.
